name: bcstack.org
tagline: An embedded, loyalty-free, lightweight ble protocol stack
body:
# About
The aim of bcstack.org is to create loyalty-free software that can be used to make BLE products. Its core is an ultra lightweight Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) single mode stack.

# License
bcstack is available under MIT license. It can be used freely in commercial products.

# Join Us
For general discussions, subscribe [btstack-general](https://lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/bcstack-general)
